##DESCRIPTION: Ensure keyboard users see a consistent focus outline across buttons, nav items, and inputs.

Acceptance criteria:
- Tabbing through the UI shows clear, consistent focus outlines on all interactive controls mentioned.
- Mouse users do not see focus outlines unless they keyboard-focus an element (focus-visible behavior).
